Description_lang: The Battletron creates floating mines around itself for protection. Any spell or ability directed at the Battletron that passes through or is cast near a mine will detonate it, inflicting $133017s1 Arcane damage to all enemies.
AuraDescription_lang: Any spell or ability that passes through or is cast near a mine will detonate it, inflicting $133017s1 Arcane damage to all enemies.
